director.name: 多鲁·尼采斯库 Doru Niţescu

introduction: In a small village in the foothills of Mariana and Alison are a young family with two children, Carmen and Mircea. One morning my mother and 10 year old daughter go to Bucharest for what should be a routine medical check. But things are more complicated and serious than they appear. Carmen, who can no longer smile, only one doctor, Sitaru gives the chance of survival, considering the head section where admitted, however, that any intervention is unnecessary. Mariana can not accept that there is nothing to do and, almost alone against all, choose to fight for her daughter.
